__e: You should have seen them today, how happy they were to see each other.
Is that why things went so bad for us ?
Well I think they came out rather well, don´t you?
If this is where they were, they didn't stay long.
Well, um... they didn't turn out quite right.
...very fond of parrots, and they were at sea for many years with my husband.
And then after a while, the door opened and they stepped into the room.
They've been on the phone all afternoon with the w.G.A.Z.
If it was all that bad, why did you stick together for 43 years?
My parents were only together for a couple of years before they had me.
You and Johnny... you were together all the time, weren't you?
You won't be together for long.
If it was all that bad, why did you stick together for 43 years?
Why weren't they afraid to die?
But the children were hungry because I wasn't home.
You know, they kept my social security?
how are those getting on whom you left at home.
Well, work means strength! I know, you all loved him because when he fell the whole world became silent...
Oh, no wonder you stayed home.
